comments.facts: Cats are believed to be the only mammals who dont taste sweetness.
Cats can jump up to six times their length!
Cats have 230 bones, while humans only have 206
Cats have the largest eyes relative to their head size of any mammal.
Cats rough tongues can lick a bone clean of any shred of meat.
Cats use their long tails to balance themselves when theyâ€™re jumping
Cats will refuse an unpalatable food to the point of starvation.
Female cats can get pregnant when they're only 4 months old!
Cats like to sleep on things that smell like their owners
White cats with blue eyes are prone to deafness.
